text: Michael John Sweeney (born July 22, 1973 in Orange, California) is a retired first baseman and designated hitter in Major League Baseball. He played for the Kansas City Royals, Oakland Athletics, Seattle Mariners and the Philadelphia Phillies. Sweeny retired in 2011. == Other websites == * *Player Information for Mike Sweeney on Kansas City Royals Official Site *ESPN.com: Mike Sweeney *The Mike and Shara Sweeney Family Foundation Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles Category:American baseball players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Oakland Athletics players Category:Seattle Mariners players Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:1973 births Category:Living people
title: Mike Sweeney
